artist: Artist: Migita Toshihide; Publisher: Akiyama Buemon
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; group of soldiers in green uniforms, crouching in a grassy field; several soldiers have guns raised, pointing them to the right at a group dressed in black, red and green uniforms; scattered plumes of white smoke at horizon line; rising mountain in background; fallen soldier in a green uniform on right
inscription: on left sheet, on back, in LRC, in pencil: DIH | on center sheet, on back, in LRC, in pencil: DIH | on left sheet, in LRC, on back, in pencil: DIH
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Records of the Hostilities between Japan and Russia (Nichiro kōsen kibun 日露交戰紀聞)
title: On March 28, Cavalries on Both Sides Clashed at Dingzhou and Faced One Another on Foot, at the End of the Battle the Bravery of Our Soldiers Greatly Prevailed and Enemy Troops Panicked
